website_summaries.verdict: A really nice mesh bag with style and size options that can be ordered to meet your needs.
pros: Nice weight and feel to the mesh material
Heavy paracord drawstring can double as an emergency cord while hiking
Can be ordered with a shoulder strap
Use several to organize clothes well in your bag
Holds up well through many uses
cons: If you do not pay attention when you order, you may get a different style or option than you intended

customer_reviews.title: Great cycling shoe bag.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to carry mountain bike shoes. Mesh just right to allow air to circulate and prevent funk, and keeps dirt from getting on everything else. Easily allows draw string to tighten on size 11 shoes. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for gym/PE class. My kid keeps his deodorant, gym shorts and white t shirt in this mesh bag inside his backpack. Take it out nightly to wash the clothes. Doesn't take up much space at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great small laundry bag for traveling. This bag is much better quality than what I can find at any store. I bought the smallest one to put in my small travel duffel. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: HaPpY camper.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. Use it as a toiletries bag for the shower at the gym. I did buy half inch brass grommets that I added to it in the corners to hang it in the shower but it works great! Good construction
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12x15 to hold my water shoes after working out in the pool. I rinse them right in the bag and then hang them to dry until the next day. The bag is perfect for my needs ... light enough for the drying action but heavy enough to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: gmp

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put golf balls in. Keeps them in one place in my golf bag rather than having balls everywhere. Works great. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small bag for the small incidental items that get lost in a weekend overnight bag. Small enough to b big enoug
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Boat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, very well constructed. Being former Military the 550 cord sold me. Plus I always will try and support a fellow Vets business. I bought these to put my second anchor rope in, and to put the tow rope for the water toys in. Breathable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: seems like the perfect travel bag for accessories
customer_reviews.text: seems to be of good quality and will be very functional for my next traveling plans. great for phone accessories and chargers
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Nice size to put my sons gym clothes in when he needs them to be washed after a weeks worth of being used. Purchased on a fri and arrived on a sunday.very fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality made multi-purpose draw string bag!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, quality, useful, sturdy, multi-purpose, inexpensive; great customer service. You won’t be disappointed with this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great Beachcombing Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect -- exactly what I was looking for. It seems extremely well made with a secure pull cord at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bag to hold all of the attachments for my car vacuum (which is wall mounted). The attachments were all over the place until I bought this bag to hold them. Now I know where to find them :-). Bag is well constructed and very well suited for this task. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Damian G.

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful thing for a pond
customer_reviews.text: I just put it in last night and it’s already clearing up the pond fits right over my pump
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, did I tell you these are great bags? Well let me tell you, these are great bags. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Grrr...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wet/damp areas like gym showers
customer_reviews.text: Strong bag. Perfect for the gym. Drawstring keeps stuff from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: MYTAKEONITEM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag large enough to hold a couple dozen golf balls so they weren't loose in my bag and this was perfect. Is well constructed with solid components and should last me a good long time. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great Shotgun hull bag.
customer_reviews.text: Using one of these for a shotgun hull bag. It's been working great for that purpose. I have another that I'll be using for rifle/pistol brass. So far, it's been just what I wanted. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Browsing history

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, the material is decently thick and I use it to hold toys for my kids in the car. It has held up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Unsworth

product_meta.title: Polyester Mesh Bag
feature_bullets: MESH BAG - A high-quality reusable polyester mesh bag features ultra-strong 550 paracord drawstring. Perfect stuff bag for gym clothes, laundry, and swimming gear.

DURABLE POLYESTER - Lightweight polyester has a natural resistance to moisture, UV rays, chemicals, and weather. Mesh design allows ample air flow and keeps essential items and clothing organized, smell-free, secure, and visible.

EMERGENCY CORD - The 550 paracord drawstring bag keeps clothes and gear tightly packed in without the worry of zipper malfunctions. The tie line can be removed and used as an emergency supply of paracord. Ideal for hunting, backpacking, and all outdoor activities.

SIZE and COLOR - Choose from a wide range of sizes (12 inch - 36 inch x 15 inch - 45 inch), with or without shoulder straps. SGT KNOTS Mesh Bag / Tote Bag / Laundry Bag is available in: Black, Red, Kelly Green, Orange, Sky Blue, Royal Blue, Gold, Purple, Neon Yellow, Neon Lime, Neon Orange, Neon Pink, Navy Blue, and Gray.

VETERAN OWNED and OPERATED - Polyester Mesh Bag made in the USA. Just like the Marine Corps, SGT KNOTS is committed to being the best of the best. We continue to live by the motto, Semper Fidelisâ€"Always Faithful. Our loyalty to our customers is what makes us who we are, and the reason we continue to grow in popularity and product offerings. We promise to maintain the strength and consistency of our products. We also pass down our bulk savings to our customers.
